promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute basic elephant fire-type pokemon with ruby skin. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or elephant. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Rubrumbo, a a chibi cute basic elephant fire-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Mega Bravo. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "elephant", "fire" or "Rubrumbo". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, elephant-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, blue and red ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This desert dweller, bathed in red, uses Mega Bravo to heat pebbles for its meals. Its endearing charm belies its powerful, fiery spirit.
